name: Hydraulic Excavator
description: Heavy-duty hydraulic excavator with 20-ton capacity. Perfect for digging, trenching, and material handling.

name: Tower Crane (50 Ton)
description: High-capacity tower crane for high-rise construction. Includes operator and maintenance.

name: Concrete Mixer (10/7)
description: Diesel-powered concrete mixer with 10/7 cubic feet capacity. Portable and easy to operate.

name: Scaffolding Set (100ft)
description: Complete scaffolding system with platforms, guardrails, and accessories. Up to 100ft height.

name: Diesel Generator (25 KVA)
description: Silent diesel generator with 25 KVA output. Automatic voltage regulation and fuel-efficient.

name: Plate Compactor
description: Vibratory plate compactor for soil and asphalt compaction. Lightweight and maneuverable.

name: Boom Lift (40ft)
description: Articulating boom lift with 40ft working height. 360-degree rotation and self-leveling platform.

name: Concrete Pump
description: Truck-mounted concrete pump with 100m vertical reach. Ideal for high-rise construction.

name: Dumper Truck (10 Ton)
description: Heavy-duty dumper truck for material transportation. 10-ton capacity with hydraulic tipping.

name: Welding Machine Set
description: Professional welding machine with electrodes and safety equipment. Suitable for all welding needs.
